Self-Defense Training: Learn self-defense techniques, such as martial arts or firearms training, to protect yourself in case of an emergency.
Neighborhood Watch: Join a neighborhood watch group to keep an eye on your community and report any suspicious activity to the authorities.
Community Engagement: Build strong relationships within your community, as neighbors can provide support and assistance during an emergency.
Emergency Fund: Maintain an emergency fund to cover expenses in case of a crisis, such as medical bills or legal fees.
Online Security: Protect your online identity by using strong, unique passwords, enabling two-factor authentication, and being cautious of phishing scams.
